resources.string: Welcome to the ExamsApp Support Page!
We are glad to see you here. Our goal is to ensure you have the best experience using our app. If you have any questions, issues, or suggestions, feel free to reach out to us.
How to contact us: \n1. Email: Drop us a message at support@examsapp.com.\n2. Phone number: +7 (927) 444-82-82
Our working hours:\nMonday - Friday: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (local time)
